mapper.sql: select id, patientcode, createdate, modifydate, id_charge, id_depart, is_delete, wsjg_id from md_outside_charge_item
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id_charge as id, i.examfeeitem_name as xmmc, i.sfxmsrm as inputCode, i.id as idItemName, i.examfeeitem_name as itemName, i.id_depart as ksId, i.depart_name as ksName FROM md_outside_charge_item t LEFT JOIN md_items i ON t.id_charge = i.id
t.is_delete = 0 AND t.patientcode = #{patientcode}
AND i.sfxmsrm LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%')
ORDER BY t.createdate DESC
